sentences.sContent: Tommy: I cleaned the bird cage and the canary disappeared.
sentences.sContent_eng: Tommy: I cleaned the bird cage and the canary disappeared.
sentences.sCn: 汤米：我刚才打扫鸟笼来着，金丝雀不见了。

sentences.sContent: Your software project might have its own kind of pit canary.
sentences.sContent_eng: Your software project might have its own kind of pit canary.
sentences.sCn: 您的软件项目也可以有自己的矿井金丝雀。

sentences.sContent: Look for some petal earth tones like canary yellow and light natural shades like aqua! There will be soon a dramatic transformation in your wedding that soon forms a fab.
sentences.sContent_eng: Look for some petal earth tones like canary yellow and light natural shades like aqua! There will be soon a dramatic transformation in your wedding that soon forms a fab.
sentences.sCn: 不妨寻找一些如金丝雀黄或如水流动的天然亮色作为裙摆的颜色，这将会使你的婚礼有一个充满戏剧性的出人意料的改变！

phrases.pCn: 加那利群岛；金丝雀群岛

trans.tranOther: a small yellow bird that people often keep as a pet
